detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuit in wool with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, jacquard-knit section at the top, long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, slightly lower crotch and zip fly and button.

Calf-length dress in softly draping, patterned satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with ties at the front. Seam under the bust, a concealed zip in one side and a skirt with a slit in one side. Partly lined.

Handbag in imitation leather with quilted sides, two handles at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. The bag is divided into three compartments, the central one of which has a zip. Two small inner compartments at each side of the bag. Lined. Size 12x25.5x34 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, fake back pockets and leg pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep V-neck, ring at the front and short sleeves.
Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with a concealed elastic gore at the front. Toe caps and soles in thermoplastic rubber (TPR).

Dress in a cotton and viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top, and long balloon sleeves with a flounce around the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gently gathered seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems, and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Umbrella with a telescopic handle and matching cover. Length 23 cm folded.
Straight-cut blouse in satin crêpe with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Vertical seam down the front and back, and a gently rounded hem.
Sleeveless, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, both front and back.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with hard-worn details, a high waist and zip fly and button.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shorts in soft twill with front pockets and a high waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Fake fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Gently fitted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and a button at the front. Flap front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathers, and a single back vent. Lined.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin.

Short tunic in a cotton weave decorated with frill trims that have overlocked edges. Grandad collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Frill trim at the back that continues down the sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Short skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a seam with gathers down one side. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and bum while keeping the skirt in shape. High waist, zip fly and button, and a slit at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist, wide smocking at the top and tiers to the hem. Partly lined in viscose.
Knee-length dress with cap sleeves, a round neckline, zip at the back and skirt with box pleats.
Swimsuit with a print motif and embroidered appliqués on the front. Lined front and lined gusset.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with elasticated smocking and a short frill trim at the top, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with a slit and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
High-waisted lace and mesh briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Suede trainers with a hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend.
Glittery fancy dress mask in the shape of a bat with an elastic strap at the back.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.
Dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the waist and patch front pockets.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a padded collar and a zip with a chin guard and grosgrain zip tab with a text print. Front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shaping briefs in microfibre and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist and hips.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Trousers in a fine rib-knit cotton and cashmere blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a slightly dropped crotch and straight legs.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Playsuit in stretch jersey with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Top in a crêpe weave with a V-shaped opening at the front, small stand-up collar, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Oversized shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with woven stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist with a decorative floral appliqué and a flared skirt. Soft cotton poplin lining.
Short, fitted dress in soft viscose jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and long sleeves.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Press-studs at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted tube top in soft cotton jersey.
Straight-cut jacket in soft faux fur with a large collar, patch front pockets and concealed press-studs down the front. Lined.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a wide belt, hook-and-eye fasteners, zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Vest tops in organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Round metal studs. Diameter approx. 0.8 cm.
Knitted jacket with a soft fleece lining, hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Briefs in jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Soft cotton cardigan in a fine, textured knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 3 cm to 4.5 cm.
Leather boots with round toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Heel 4 cm.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a flap back pocket with a button, and legs with creases. Regular Fit.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short sleeves. Two elasticated seams and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Thin, knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, front pockets and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. No fasteners. Unlined.
Shorts in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Short A-line skirt.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides.

Calf-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck and wrapover top with flounces that continue upwards to the shoulders. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a wrapover skirt that is longer at the back. Lined with a short jersey skirt.
Thong briefs in microfibre with lace sections, a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a collar and lower section in a cotton weave, and a rounded hem.
